Body.Build: Glass front, glass back, aluminum frame

Platform.OS: Android 10, Magic UI 3, no Google Play Services
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (2x2.86 GHz Cortex-A76 & 2x2.36 GHz Cortex-A76 & 4x1.95 GHz Cortex-A55)

Memory.Card slot: NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot)

Main Camera.Quad:
40 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1/1.7", PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
8 MP, f/3.4, 125mm (Periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
16 MP, f/2.2, 18mm (ultrawide)
2 MP, (depth)

Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS, NavIC

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Misc.Colors: Titanium silver, Emerald Green, Midnight Black, Icelandic Frost, Neon purple
